text: Tony Hawk's American Wasteland is a skateboarding video game that was on the Playstation 2, Xbox, Xbox 360, Nintendo GameCube and PC. The game was developed by Neversoft and published by Activision. The PC version of the game was ported/published by Aspyr. title: Tony Hawk's American Wasteland
